segment.source: title: Hyper-V on Windows 10
segment.target: title: Hyper-V on Windows 10

segment.source: Hyper-V on Windows 10
segment.target: Hyper-V on Windows 10

segment.source: 18-Nov update, Part4!
segment.target: 18-Nov update, Part4!

segment.source: Hyper-V lets you run more than one 32-bit or 64-bit x86 operating system at the same time on the same computer.
segment.target: Hyper-V lets you run more than one 32-bit or 64-bit x86 operating system at the same time on the same computer.

segment.source: Instead of running directly on the computer’s hardware, the operating systems run inside of a virtual machine (VM).
segment.target: Instead of running directly on the computer’s hardware, the operating systems run inside of a virtual machine (VM).

segment.source: Hyper-V in Windows is sometimes referred to as Client Hyper-V.
segment.target: Hyper-V in Windows is sometimes referred to as Client Hyper-V.

segment.source: What's new in Hyper-V?
segment.target: What's new in Hyper-V?

segment.source: Read to learn about new and changed features for Hyper-V in Windows 10.
segment.target: Read to learn about new and changed features for Hyper-V in Windows 10.

segment.source: It will walk you through enabling Hyper-V, creating a virtual machine, and simple management through Hyper-V Manager and PowerShell.
segment.target: It will walk you through enabling Hyper-V, creating a virtual machine, and simple management through Hyper-V Manager and PowerShell.

segment.source: Important: You must license the software running on each of the guest virtual machines according to their operating system requirements.
segment.target: Important: You must license the software running on each of the guest virtual machines according to their operating system requirements.
